name: Curiosity (itch) (exelotl)
description:
A small ambient platformer written in ooc with my custom game engine, Vamos.

A block falls from the sky and takes on a life of its own. Explore the world, find secrets, leap into the unknown. Some dexterity and thinking outside the box required.

Cookie to anyone who manages to plant the flower at the end of the map!

Arrow keys to move (Down to use items)
The game ends when the screen fades to white

Jam page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-26/?action=preview&uid=5246
Blog post: http://ludumdare.com/compo/2013/05/10/curiosity/
